last_episode_to_air.name: You Should Know What's Best
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Luc discovers that Dominik stole the drug shipment and has been selling them via the prostitutes.

Valentina defends her son and insists that Luc stays on her side. Lucky visits his sister. Bianca and Luc investigate the threats made to Lucky, and set a trap to catch Dominik and Toni.

name: Capitani
overview: The body of a teenage girl is found in the forest near the rural village of Manscheid, deep in the North of Luxembourg. Luc Capitani, a gruff detective from the South of the country, is put in charge of the case. Having trouble navigating the closed, communal and protective mentality of the northerners, Capitani finds himself unwillingly dependent on the help of Elsa Ley, a young and intrepid local policewoman. The officers quickly find themselves entangled in a web of secrets and lies.

episodes.name: Oh You, Up There
episodes.overview: Capitani enlists local police officer Elsa Ley to help him investigate how a 15-year-old girl ended up dead in the forest surrounding her village.

episodes.name: Beneath His Dark, Wooden Crown
episodes.overview: The village launches a search party for Tanja as suspicion lands on someone close to the Engels. Capitani encounters a friend he hasn't seen in years.

episodes.name: Out of Childhood, Out of Childhood
episodes.overview: Capitani searches for clues near the crime scene, and Elsa hatches a plan to retrieve evidence from Jenny's school — and slips away for an appointment.

episodes.name: No Rest for the Eyes, No Rest for the Heart
episodes.overview: As rumors about the latest developments fly around the village, Capitani sifts through shaky alibis, lies and local political drama.

episodes.name: Strangers Will Be Obliged to Accept
episodes.overview: New evidence unravels a witness statement, Capitani loses patience during an interrogation, and Elsa finds her personal life in conflict with her job.

episodes.name: So Far from Me, So Far!
episodes.overview: Capitani and Elsa pursue two promising suspects, Tanja's friends grow concerned about her behavior and Mick pushes for details on the investigation.

episodes.name: And I Know Misfortune and Sorrow
episodes.overview: Leaked information leads to an act of vengeance, an incident from Capitani's past causes trouble, and Elsa's inquiries hit worryingly close to home.

episodes.name: These Wonderful Golden Dreams
episodes.overview: As the police track the drug operation, Capitani forces Manon's hand. The soldiers hit a delivery snag, and Mick betrays his feelings about Jenny.

episodes.name: My Heart Was Full of Trust
episodes.overview: Capitani comes under scrutiny for a long-ago mistake, while a hidden letter, a secret phone and a distressed father help to blow the case wide open.

episodes.name: I Knew Nothing of Tears and Pain
episodes.overview: Capitani feels the clock ticking on his investigation, prompting him to share confidences with Elsa, who rashly follows a lead on the missing soldiers.

episodes.name: My Breast Full of Darkest Night
episodes.overview: After guns are drawn and shots fired, Capitani faces increasing pressure to close the case and move on despite his many unanswered questions.

episodes.name: It Happened One Beautiful Summer's Day
episodes.overview: With his career on the line and the lies piling up, Capitani races to uncover the truth of what happened to Jenny and Tanja on that fateful night.

episodes.name: In Your Sights
episodes.overview:
Four years after the events in Manscheid, Luc Capitani is working as a handyman in the station district of Luxembourg City.

Until Bianca, a prostitute, hires him to investigate the disappearance of her friend Andrea. The search is cut short when Capitani locates her body in a forest, and the hunt for her killer begins. Meanwhile, Lucky Onu arrives in Luxembourg from Nigeria, to look for his sister.

episodes.name: There's Someone on the Corner
episodes.overview:
Capitani is hired by Valentina Draga to look after her "girls". Lucky locates his sister, who wants nothing to do with him.

Police officer Elsa Ley is monitoring drug traffic in the area, but the relationship between her and Luc has deteriorated. A second prostitute is murdered in the night.

episodes.name: Hit or Run
episodes.overview:
Capitani reveals he is working as an undercover police officer for Pascale Cojocaru, which enabled him to walk free from prison.

Luc and Elsa share information on the murders. Bianca informs Luc of underage prostitutes working at a cabaret club in the city. Lucky struggles to get hold of his sister.

episodes.name: Until The First Approaches You
episodes.overview:
Gibbes Koenig joins forces with Valentina to combat a Nigerian drug gang.

Luc tries to organise a coup, but needs Elsa's help, but Elsa calls him a crook and refuses to work with him.  Luc's relationship with his boss Cojocaru starts to collapse.

episodes.name: Your Last Thought
episodes.overview:
Capitani helps Lucky view the body of his sister in return for information on the drug operations around Luxembourg City station.

Toni is mistrustful of Luc and forbids Bianca from spending time with him, but agrees to accompany Luc on a trip to the forest to meet with a dealer.

episodes.name: If Only I Fled
episodes.overview:
Luc discovers his former lover Carla Pereira is supplying the Nigerians with drugs. She asks him to leave her alone.

Elsa and Toni spend the night together but try to continue working together. Luc seeks assistance from his sister Jeanne, but the siblings' relationship has been rocky since the death of their father. Pascale Cojocaru realises that something is hindering Luc's release.

episodes.name: No Time to Lose
episodes.overview:
Capitani organises an attack on a Nigerian mafia drug shipment.

Cojucaru promises Luc his freedom if the operation is successful and if Arthur is taken into custody. Luc forces Carla to participate in the attack. Lucky asks Bianca for help finding Grace. Elsa suspects that Luc is working undercover.

episodes.name: The First One to Fall
episodes.overview:
Arthur is found dead, while the drug shipment has disappeared.

Lucky is imprisoned by Queen as he represents a risk to the operation. Valentina forces Gibbes to withdraw from the business. Cojucaru is unsuccessful in securing Luc's full release, although he has earned her trust. Luc decides to work for Valentina.

episodes.name: Late at Night
episodes.overview:
Elsa and Luc suspect that Carla is behind the drug shipment's disappearance.

Protesting her innocence, Carla reveals significant information about drug dealings at the "Grand Huit" café, which Luc passes on to Elsa. Grace tells Bianca that Dominik tried to kill her. Bianca demands an explanation from Dominik.

episodes.name: You Are Alone
episodes.overview:
Valentina takes over Gibbes' business, and thanks Luc for sorting the problem with the Nigerian dealer.

Elsa observes that the drug traffic is continuing to operate. Bianca wonders where her former friends are getting their cash flow from. An injured Lucky seeks to return to the city. Luc and Elsa talk for the first time.

episodes.name: Wipe the Smile From Your Face
episodes.overview:
Cojocaru locates Luc's service weapon in Manscheid lake and returns it to him.

Luc must confront his inner turmoil. Elsa and Toni monitor the prostitutes at the station, but Toni seems to have other plans in mind. Luc takes Lucky in, and Bianca finds Grace's address.

episodes.name: You Should Know What's Best
episodes.overview:
Luc discovers that Dominik stole the drug shipment and has been selling them via the prostitutes.

Valentina defends her son and insists that Luc stays on her side. Lucky visits his sister. Bianca and Luc investigate the threats made to Lucky, and set a trap to catch Dominik and Toni.
